definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: They barely seem to realize that the danger hidden there, just like the ancient inaccessible palace .
sentences.chinese: 殊不知“豪门”暗藏的凶险，就像古代的深宫。

sentences.english: He wishes one day he could marry a fortune that can help him in his career.
sentences.chinese: 他梦想有一天能倒插豪门，这样他能少奋斗好几年。

sentences.english: Customer satisfaction-HOMER always has the mission.
sentences.chinese: 顾客满意，是豪门的使命。

sentences.english: He belongs to the rich and powerful families in this region.
sentences.chinese: 他是这一带的豪门富户。

sentences.english: Ribery has been the subject of several transfer links this summer.
sentences.chinese: 里贝里是今夏诸多豪门追逐的对象。

sentences.english: She tried everthing to marry into money .
sentences.chinese: 为了嫁入豪门，她想尽了办法。

sentences.english: The “Godfather” is a story about the powerful mafia families in New York.
sentences.chinese: 电影《教父》就是有关纽约黑手党的豪门大户的故事。

sentences.english: She tried everthing to marry into money.
sentences.chinese: 为了嫁入豪门，她想尽了办法。

sentences.english: We got two very good results against two of the best teams in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 我们接连击败了两支曾不可一世的欧洲豪门。

sentences.english: Internazionale have ruled out any suggestions that they were prepared to sell star striker Christian Vieri to Premiership moneybags Chelsea.
sentences.chinese: 国米否认会将王牌射手维耶里出售给英超豪门切尔西。

sentences.english: "I'm 29 and this is my last chance to play at the highest level, " said the 29-year-old.
sentences.chinese: 我已经29了，这可能是我最后一次机会为豪门效力。

definition: to study abroad (old term)/same as 留學|留学
Marseille, city in south France/Basay, one of the indigenous peoples of Taiwan
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
to transfer to another club (professional sports)
Serie A, the top division of the Italian football league system
FC Internazionale Milano (football club)/abbr. for 國際米蘭足球俱樂部|国际米兰足球俱乐部[Guo2 ji4 Mi3 lan2 Zu2 qiu2 Ju4 le4 bu4]
